verses.verse: And <WG2532> I heard<WG191> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> temple<WG3485> saying<WG3004> to the<WG3588> seven<WG2033> angels,<WG32> Go your ways,<WG5217> and<WG2532> pour out<WG1632> the<WG3588> vials<WG5357> of the<WG3588> wrath<WG2372> of God<WG2316> upon<WG1519> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> went,<WG565> and<WG2532> poured out<WG1632> his<WG848> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth;<WG1093> and<WG2532> there fell<WG1096> a noisome<WG2556> and<WG2532> grievous<WG4190> sore<WG1668> upon<WG1519> the<WG3588> men<WG444> which had<WG2192> the<WG3588> mark<WG5480> of the<WG3588> beast,<WG2342> and<WG2532> upon them which worshiped<WG4352> his<WG848> image.<WG1504>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG848> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1519> the<WG3588> sea;<WG2281> and<WG2532> it became<WG1096> as<WG5613> the blood<WG129> of a dead<WG3498> man: and<WG2532> every<WG3956> living<WG2198> soul<WG5590> died<WG599> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> sea.<WG2281>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG848> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1519> the<WG3588> rivers<WG4215> and<WG2532> <WG1519> fountains<WG4077> of waters;<WG5204> and<WG2532> they became<WG1096> blood.<WG129>

And <WG2532> I heard<WG191> the<WG3588> angel<WG32> of the<WG3588> waters<WG5204> say,<WG3004> Thou art<WG1488> righteous,<WG1342> O Lord,<WG2962> which art,<WG5607> and<WG2532> wast,<WG2258> and<WG2532> shalt be,<WG2071> because<WG3754> thou hast judged<WG2919> thus.<WG5023>

For <WG3754> they have shed<WG1632> the blood<WG129> of saints<WG40> and<WG2532> prophets,<WG4396> and<WG2532> thou hast given<WG1325> them<WG846> blood<WG129> to drink;<WG4095> for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> worthy.<WG514>

And <WG2532> I heard<WG191> another<WG243> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> altar<WG2379> say,<WG3004> Even so,<WG3483> Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> Almighty,<WG3841> true<WG228> and<WG2532> righteous<WG1342> are thy<WG4675> judgments.<WG2920>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> fourth<WG5067> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG848> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> sun;<WG2246> and<WG2532> power was given<WG1325> unto him<WG846> to scorch<WG2739> men<WG444> with<WG1722> fire.<WG4442>

And <WG2532> men<WG444> were scorched<WG2739> with great<WG3173> heat,<WG2738> and<WG2532> blasphemed<WG987> the<WG3588> name<WG3686> of God,<WG2316> which hath<WG2192> power<WG1849> over<WG1909> these<WG5025> plagues:<WG4127> and<WG2532> they repented<WG3340> not<WG3756> to give<WG1325> him<WG846> glory.<WG1391>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> fifth<WG3991> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG848> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> seat<WG2362> of the<WG3588> beast;<WG2342> and<WG2532> his<WG848> kingdom<WG932> was<WG1096> full of darkness;<WG4656> and<WG2532> they gnawed<WG3145> their<WG848> tongues<WG1100> for<WG1537> pain,<WG4192>

And <WG2532> blasphemed<WG987> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of heaven<WG3772> because of<WG1537> their<WG848> pains<WG4192> and<WG2532> <WG1537> their<WG848> sores,<WG1668> and<WG2532> repented<WG3340> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> their<WG848> deeds.<WG2041>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> sixth<WG1623> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG848> vial<WG5357> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> great<WG3173> river<WG4215> Euphrates;<WG2166> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> water<WG5204> thereof<WG848> was dried up,<WG3583> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> way<WG3598> of the<WG3588> kings<WG935> of<WG575> the east<WG395> <WG2246> might be prepared.<WG2090>

And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> three<WG5140> unclean<WG169> spirits<WG4151> like<WG3664> frogs<WG944> come out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> mouth<WG4750> of the<WG3588> dragon,<WG1404> and<WG2532> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> mouth<WG4750> of the<WG3588> beast,<WG2342> and<WG2532> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> mouth<WG4750> of the<WG3588> false prophet.<WG5578>

For <WG1063> they are<WG1526> the spirits<WG4151> of devils,<WG1142> working<WG4160> miracles,<WG4592> which<WG3739> go forth<WG1607> unto<WG1909> the<WG3588> kings<WG935> of the<WG3588> earth<WG1093> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> whole<WG3650> world,<WG3625> to gather<WG4863> them<WG846> to<WG1519> the<WG3588> battle<WG4171> of that<WG1565> great<WG3173> day<WG2250> of God<WG2316> Almighty.<WG3841>

Behold, <WG2400> I come<WG2064> as<WG5613> a thief.<WG2812> Blessed<WG3107> is he that watcheth,<WG1127> and<WG2532> keepeth<WG5083> his<WG848> garments,<WG2440> lest<WG3363> he walk<WG4043> naked,<WG1131> and<WG2532> they see<WG991> his<WG848> shame. <WG808>
And <WG2532> he gathered them together<WG4863> <WG846> into<WG1519> a place<WG5117> called<WG2564> in the Hebrew tongue<WG1447> Armageddon.<WG717>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> seventh<WG1442> angel<WG32> poured out<WG1632> his<WG848> vial<WG5357> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> air;<WG109> and<WG2532> there came<WG1831> a great<WG3173> voice<WG5456> out of<WG575> the<WG3588> temple<WG3485> of heaven,<WG3772> from<WG575> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> saying,<WG3004> It is done.<WG1096>

And <WG2532> there were<WG1096> voices,<WG5456> and<WG2532> thunders,<WG1027> and<WG2532> lightnings;<WG796> and<WG2532> there was<WG1096> a great<WG3173> earthquake,<WG4578> such as<WG3634> was<WG1096> not<WG3756> since<WG575> <WG3739> men<WG444> were<WG1096> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> so mighty<WG5082> an earthquake,<WG4578> and so<WG3779> great.<WG3173>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> great<WG3173> city<WG4172> was divided<WG1096> into<WG1519> three<WG5140> parts,<WG3313> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> cities<WG4172> of the<WG3588> nations<WG1484> fell:<WG4098> and<WG2532> great<WG3173> Babylon<WG897> came in remembrance<WG3415> before<WG1799> God,<WG2316> to give<WG1325> unto her<WG846> the<WG3588> cup<WG4221> of the<WG3588> wine<WG3631> of the fierceness<WG2372> of his<WG848> wrath.<WG3709>
And <WG2532> every<WG3956> island<WG3520> fled away,<WG5343> and<WG2532> the mountains<WG3735> were not<WG3756> found.<WG2147>

And <WG2532> there fell<WG2597> upon<WG1909> men<WG444> a great<WG3173> hail<WG5464> out of<WG1537> heaven,<WG3772> every stone about<WG5613> the weight of a talent:<WG5006> and<WG2532> men<WG444> blasphemed<WG987> God<WG2316> because of<WG1537> the<WG3588> plague<WG4127> of the<WG3588> hail;<WG5464> for<WG3754> the<WG3588> plague<WG4127> thereof<WG848> was<WG2076> exceeding<WG4970> great.<WG3173>
